name: not color switch
description:
little clone of colour switch made in 30 minutes, with my own little twist.

i was bored. lol.

UPDATE V1.1.0:
- Fixed a bug where UI text would render below objects for some reason.
- Fixed a bug where frames would be dropped on lower hardware.
- High score function that nobody asked for.
- LiNuX bUiLd OmG
- You can now jitter click the player character and its really fricking satisfying.
- Particle       T     R      A      I       L        behind the character.

Probably the last update I'm going to do on this since I'm going to be working on other projects and this was just meant to be a fun little experiment into copyright infringement and how to avoid it anyways.
